<script>
  // Control value of slide bar
  let slideBar = document.getElementById("slide-bar");
  let slid_max = slideBar.max;
  let slid_min = slideBar.min;
  showSlides(0);

  setInterval(increase_slide, 3000);

  function increase_slide(){
    if (slideBar.value == slid_max) {
      slideBar.value = slid_min;
    }
    else{
      slideBar.value++;
    }

    showSlides(slideBar.value);
  }

  slideBar.oninput = function() {
    showSlides(slideBar.value);
  }

  // Show different div
  function showSlides(n){
    let i;
    let slides = document.getElementsByClassName("slide-div-side");
    slideIndex = n % slides.length;
    for (i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
      slides[i].style.display = "none";
    }
    slides[slideIndex].style.display = "inline";
    
    slides = document.getElementsByClassName("slide-div-content");
    slideIndex = n % slides.length;
    for (i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
      slides[i].style.display = "none";
    }
    slides[slideIndex].style.display = "block";    
  }
</script>
